00092 class MockFile : public IFile
00093 {
00094 public:
00096         typedef std::vector< std::string > LineCont;
00097 
00102         MockFile( const LineCont lines )
00103                 : line_( 0 ), lines_( lines )
00104         {
00105         }
00106         
00107         bool Open( const std::string& filename )
00108         {
00109                 line_ = 0;
00110                 return true;
00111         }
00112 
00113         void Close()
00114         {}
00115 
00116         std::string Read()
00117         {
00118                 std::string result = lines_[ line_ ];
00119                 ++line_;
00120                 return result;
00121         }
00122 
00123 private:
00125         int line_;
00126 
00128         const LineCont lines_;
00129 };
00130 
00132 void TestMockFile()
00133 {
00134         MockFile::LineCont lines;
00135         lines.push_back( "Line 1" );
00136         lines.push_back( "Line 2" );
00137         lines.push_back( "Line 3" );
00138         lines.push_back( "Line 4" );
00139 
00140         MockFile mockFile( lines );
00141         IS_TRUE( mockFile.Open( "myfile.txt") );
00142         IS_EQUAL( lines[0], mockFile.Read() );
00143         IS_EQUAL( lines[1], mockFile.Read() );
00144         IS_EQUAL( lines[2], mockFile.Read() );
00145         IS_EQUAL( lines[3], mockFile.Read() );
00146 }
00147 
00149 int main()
00150 {
00151         using namespace Aeryn;
00152         TestRunner testRunner;
00153         testRunner.Add( USE_NAME( TestCase( USE_NAME( TestMockFile ) ) ) );
00154         return testRunner.Run();
00155 }
